subject: p10715477
Findings: New PICC line on the right is projecting with its tip somewhere in the mediastinum. Appears to cross the midline, there is concern for potential arterial location. The initial line concerns were communicated over the telephone at the time of the wet read. Repeat PA and lateral radiograph, taken approximately an hour after the radiograph demonstrated the PICC line in the mid SVC. Potential small right pleural effusion. Stable moderate cardiomegaly.
